roleset.name: slice off a piece

example.name: That ever confusing "what do you mean medium' arg 2
example.text: The sound of the slash of the sword threw the air was terrifyingly close.

example.name: Arg 1 even if you don't know you cut them
example.text: Shikamaru barely avoided the quick slash of the knife at his face and Neji's eyes widened.

roleset.note: Based on Bolt data. Comparison to slash.01-v. Slash.01-v is a member of VN class cut-21-1-1. Framed by Katie.
